goals__remit:
Founded in 1962, EFFAS is the federation representing various nationally based societies of investment professionals in Europe. Our main goals are: 
Being a center for reflexion and think tank, encouraging the research and the independent opinion on Economy, Finance and Financial and Stock Markets with the ultimate goal of setting necessary standards for the finance industry. 
Being a Working and Discussion Forum for qualified professionals and researchers in those fields and also with the economic and financial authorities in order to facilitate the modernisation and best knowledge of capital markets. 
Being an International referent in Training and Professionals´ Qualifications, promoting the recognition among regulators and third parties of the EFFAS Diplomas. Ensuring professional development and continue training through seminars, conferences, professional meetings, etc. 
Being a Standards setter, continuously working on the development of additional standards that are instrumental in guaranteeing a high level of quality in the exercise of the investment profession.
